task.title: Import BDD custom fields from Jira to (Applicable to Jira Cloud integration)

li.p: This step is necessary if you want to conduct BDD testing with Jira. If you don't run BDD tests or you are integrating Jira Data Center (Jira Server) with Katalon, skip this section and move to .
You have configured the Katalon BDD fields in Jira. See: .

taskbody.context: From version 7.8.0 onwards, you can import the BDD custom fields to when importing BDD feature files for Jira Cloud integration. Follow these steps:

step.cmd: Go to Projects > Settings > Plugin > Jira.
In the Fetch Options section, check the Enable retrieving content of the specified custom field box.

image.alt: Fetch BDD custom fields to Katalon Studio

step.cmd: Select a custom field from the dropdown list.

ul.li: Only the existing custom field ID is valid for this configuration.
In case you can not find the custom field in the dropdown list, click Fetch Custom Fields to fetch the latest list from the connected Jira Cloud.

step.cmd: Click Apply and Close to apply your settings.

taskbody.result: You have successfully imported BDD custom fields from Jira to . You can now start importing your BDD test cases to to execute and view test results.
